Mother of Cats, the Perfumed Protector, Patroness of Festhalls
PORTFOLIO: Cats, fertility, childbirth, women & children, perfumes, sensual pleasures, music, dance
DOMAINS: [Chaos, Destruction, Protection, Strength, War] [Family, Charm, Travel, Good]
AMIA DOMAINS: [Animal], Destruction, [War or Travel]
ALIGN.: CG
CLERGY'S ALIGN.: 
WOR. ALIGN.: 

-------------------------
Source: adapted from the Sharess entry in Faiths & Pantheons (pp.51-52)

- align & domains from Deities & Demigods (3e?)

- info on perfumed goddess & music, dance, fertility, motherhood from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bast_(mythology) & http://www.crystalinks.com/bast.html

* most of this is basically made up by me from a combination of D&D and historical info; not sure what domains to pick to avoid overpowering her, the Destruction domain fits her more martial aspect
-------------------------

PORTFOLIO: Love, romance, beauty, fine art, artists
DOMAINS: Chaos, Charm, Elf, Good, Magic, Protection 
AMIA DOMAINS: [Good, Magic, Protection]
ALIGN.: CG
CLERGY'S ALIGN.: CG, CN, NG 
WOR. ALIGN.: 

-------------------------
Source: adapted from Demihuman Deities pp.138-140
-------------------------

Green Sister, the Wise, the Watchful Mother
PORTFOLIO: Nature, agriculture, weather, song, dance, beauty, romantic love
DOMAINS: [Air, Charm, Hin, Plants]
AMIA DOMAINS: [Air, Good, Plant]
ALIGN.: N
CLERGY'S ALIGN.: LG, NG, CG, N, CN [other sources say NG, CN, N, NE, LN]
WOR. ALIGN.: LG, NG, CG, LN, N, CN

-------------------------
Source: adapted from Demihuman Deities, pp.210-211
-------------------------

Lady of Life, Lady of Mercy, the Merciful, the Bountiful, the Shining Dancer
PORTFOLIO: Healing, mercy, romantic love, fertility, dancing, courtship, the moon
DOMAINS: Chaos, Charm, Dwarf, Good, Healing, Moon
AMIA DOMAINS: Earth, Good, Healing
ALIGN.: CG
CLERGY'S ALIGN.: LG, NG, CG
WOR. ALIGN.: LG, NG, CG, LN, N, CN, LE, NE, CE

-------------------------
Source: adapted from Demihuman Deities, pp.98-99
-------------------------

The Dancer, the Dancing Lady
PORTFOLIO: [Love, passion, sensual pleasures, music, dance]
DOMAINS: 
AMIA DOMAINS: [Good, Trickery, Protection]
ALIGN.: NG [or CG]
CLERGY'S ALIGN.: 
WOR. ALIGN.: 

-------------------------
Source: adapted from the Sharess entry in Faiths & Pantheons (p.52)

* domains made up by me
-------------------------

PORTFOLIO: [Cats, the hunt]
DOMAINS: 
AMIA DOMAINS: [Animal, Strength, Travel]
ALIGN.: [probably N]
CLERGY'S ALIGN.: [NG, CN, NE, LN]
WOR. ALIGN.: 

-------------------------
Source: made up entirely by me based on a similarity in names to Felidae from from the Sharess entry in Faiths & Pantheons (p.52)
-------------------------

This is the default waypoint you may place to set a patrol path for a creature or NPC.
1. Create the creature and either use its current Tag or fill in a new one.
2. Place or make sure the WalkWayPoints() is within the body of the On Spawn script for the creature.
3. Place a series of waypoints along the route you wish the creature to walk.
4. Select all of the newly created waypoints and right click. Choose the Create Set option.
5. The waypoint set will have a set name of "WP_" + NPC Tag. Thus if an NPC with the Tag "Guard" will have a waypoint set called "WP_Guard". Note that Tags are case sensitive.

This is the default waypoint you may place to set a patrol path for a creature or NPC.
1. Create the creature and either use its current Tag or fill in a new one.
2. Place or make sure the WalkWayPoints() is within the body of the On Spawn script for the creature.
3. Place a series of waypoints along the route you wish the creature to walk.
4. Select all of the newly created waypoints and right click. Choose the Create Set option.
5. The waypoint set will have a set name of "WP_" + NPC Tag. Thus if an NPC with the Tag "Guard" will have a waypoint set called "WP_Guard". Note that Tags are case sensitive.
